nodes.text: Tarso Gren was a male Human Exarch of the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. He commanded the Star Fortress above Tatooine until 3631 BBY, when the Commander of the Anti-Zakuul Alliance boarded the Star Fortress and killed him, overloading the Sun Generator and destroying the entire battlestation in process.
Tarso Gren appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire as the final boss of the Tatooine Star Fortress.
